Prebuilt static Curl 7.70.0 with zlib 1.2.11 for Windows with Windows XP support.

Compiler: Visual Studio 2017 v141_xp
Enabled features: SSL IPv6 libz AsynchDNS SSPI SPNEGO Kerberos NTLM
Enabled protocols: DICT FILE FTP FTPS GOPHER HTTP HTTPS IMAP IMAPS LDAP POP3 POP3S RTSP SMB SMBS SMTP SMTPS TELNET TFTP
Enabled SSL backends: WinSSL
